to explain; to comment; to annotate
объяснить; комментировать; комментировать
rtega_mnemonic:

诠诠		explain, expound, comment on, truth, discussion

purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 詮)
Pictophonetic: 全 indicates the sound; 讠 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
诠释 [ quán shì ]: to interpret; to comment and explain; to annotate; to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role); to decode; interpretation; annotation
诠注 [ quán zhù ]: notes and commentary; exegesis
诠释学 [ quán shì xué ]: hermeneutics
真诠 [ zhēn quán ]: to explain truly (esp. of classic or religious text); true commentary; correct exegesis
诠释资料 [ quán shì zī liào ]: metadata
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 讠 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 全 [ quán ] whole, entire, complete; to preserve
Ru_trainchinese: quán: (графема) (книжн.) объяснять, толковать; причина, правда

诠字的基本解释

诠
（詮）
quán
解释：诠解。诠注。诠释。诠证。诠言。诠次（ａ．条理、层次，如“辞无诠诠”；ｂ．选择和编排，如“诠诠不精，致有差误”）。
事物的理：直诠（即真理）。发必中（zh恘g ）诠（说出话来必定符合事理）。诠有专长。博诠多才。
分门别类的有系统的知识：诠说。哲诠。数诠。

诠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》此緣切，平仙，清。］
“诠1”的繁体字。
(1)详尽解释；阐明。
(2)道理，事物的规律。
(3)通“銓”。犹衡量，考虑。
(4)通“銓”。铨选，选择。参见“詮次”、“詮擇”。
(5)用同“跧”。低下。参见“詮才末學”。
(6)全。太平天囯避洪秀全名讳，凡用“全”字的地方，均以“銓”、“詮”等字替代。
(7)文体名。史传论赞的别称。

诠字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詮； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1188第18
【唐韻】此緣切【集韻】【韻會】逡緣切【正韻】且緣切，?音銓。【說文】具也。【玉篇】治亂之體也。【廣韻】平也。【類篇】擇言也。又解喩也。【晉書·武陔傳】文帝數與詮論。【音義】謂具說事理也。【?書·傅縡傳】言爲心使，心受言詮。【吳越春秋】惟夫子詮斯義也。【註】擇言也。【杜甫·秋日詠懷詩】衣褐向眞詮。　又【淮南子·詮言訓註】詮，就也。就萬物之指，以言其徵，事之所謂，道之所依也。　又【金史·選舉志】凡會試，詮讀官二員。

诠字的源字形

诠字的起名意思

：解释事物的道理，诠释真理。如发必中诠，阐明事理。

Interpretation
Basic explanation of words
Interpretation
(Interpretation)
quán
Explanation: Interpretation. Annotation. Interpretation. Interpretation. Interpretation. The order of interpretation (a. Order and level, such as "words have no interpretation"; b. Selection and arrangement, such as "the interpretation is not precise, resulting in errors").
The truth of things: direct interpretation (that is, truth). Fat will be in (zh 恘 g) interpretation (speaking must be in line with the affair). Interpretation has expertise. Bo Quan and versatility.
Disaggregated systematic knowledge: interpretation. Philosophy. Number interpretation.
Interpretation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" this edge cut, Pingxian, Qing. ]
Traditional characters for "調1".
(1) Detailed explanation; clarification.
(2) Reason, the law of things.
(3) Through "Quan". Still weigh and consider.
(4) Through "Quan". Choose, choose. See "Quan Time", "Quan Choice".
(5) Use the same as "跧". low. See "Explanation of Talents and Final Learning".
(6) Full. The Taiping Heavenly Kingdom avoided the taboo of Hongxiu's full name, and wherever the word "quan" was used, the words "quan" and "quan" were used instead.
(7) The name of the style. Another name for historical biography.

Interpretation
Source glyph
Interpretation
Name meaning
: Explain the truth of things and interpret the truth. If it is issued, it must be interpreted and clarified.
诠

声。詮简化为诠。本义是详尽解释、说明。
